mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_nutr_eat_stnd.select */ SELECT sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,dd_rcmd_qty /* dd_rcmd_qty 일_권장_량 numeric */ ,dd_need_qty /* dd_need_qty 일_필요_량 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_dd_nutr_eat_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_nutr_eat_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_dd_nutr_eat_stnd ( sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,dd_rcmd_qty /* dd_rcmd_qty 일_권장_량 numeric */ ,dd_need_qty /* dd_need_qty 일_필요_량 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{ddRcmdQty} /* dd_rcmd_qty 일_권장_량 numeric */ ,#{ddNeedQty} /* dd_need_qty 일_필요_량 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_nutr_eat_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_dd_nutr_eat_stnd
,dd_rcmd_qty = #{ddRcmdQty} /* dd_rcmd_qty 일_권장_량 numeric */
,dd_need_qty = #{ddNeedQty} /* dd_need_qty 일_필요_량 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
